metadata.title: The Presence of Alpha Interferon at the Time of Infection Alters the Innate and Adaptive Immune Responses to Porcine Reproductive and Respiratory Syndrome Virus

abstract.original_text: FIG 5 Cytokine levels in BALF 14 days after inoculation with Ad5-IFN-␣ or Ad5-null and PRRSV or mock challenge with medium from noninfected cell culture.

sentences.segment_text: FIG 5 Cytokine levels in BALF 14 days after inoculation with Ad5-IFN - ␣ or Ad5-null and PRRSV or mock challenge with medium from noninfected cell culture .

abstract.original_text: Data are expressed as the mean Ϯ SEM of 4 pigs in the Ad5-IFN-␣/PRRSV and Ad5-IFN-␣/mock groups and 5 pigs in the Ad5-null/PRRSV group. Brockmeier et al. 512 cvi.asm.org Clinical and Vaccine Immunology
